mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shixun_id as shixunId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.shixun_order_types as shixunOrderTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,shixun.shixun_name as shixunName ,shixun.shixun_uuid_number as shixunUuidNumber ,shixun.shixun_photo as shixunPhoto ,shixun.shixun_types as shixunTypes ,shixun.shixun_content as shixunContent ,shixun.shixun_delete as shixunDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_types as yonghuTypes ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM shixun_order a left JOIN shixun shixun ON a.shixun_id = shixun.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.shixun_id = #{params.shixunId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.shixun_order_types = #{params.shixunOrderTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.shixun_id IS NOT NULL
and shixun.shixun_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixunName},'%')
and shixun.shixun_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixunUuidNumber},'%')
and shixun.shixun_types = #{params.shixunTypes}
and shixun.shixun_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixunContent},'%')
and shixun.shixun_delete >= #{params.shixunDeleteStart}
and shixun.shixun_delete <= #{params.shixunDeleteEnd}
and shixun.shixun_delete = #{params.shixunDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixun.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(shixun.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_types = #{params.yonghuTypes}
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
